name: Creed (dimlight07)
description:
A sleeping mechanical body has somehow been restored to power.

 It left its repair bin, wandering aimlessly through the empty cloister with mostly damaged memory. Suddenly, the broadcast rang. 

Help Creed find and repair her pairs through the reverse doors. 

Each time entering the reverse door, whole time of the game may "reverse". 

Three different endings, five progressive levels of difficulty, one gentle AI, everything is waiting for you to explore.
